wikipedia_page.main: Walter Allen Jenkins (1 April 1891 – 26 September 1958) was an English academic. He served as the 7th vice-chancellor of the University of Dhaka during 1953–1956.

response: * Walter Allen Jenkins, 7th vice-chancellor of the University of Dhaka

In 1953, Khan joined University of Dhaka as a secretary to Sayed Moazzem Hossain, the then vice-chancellor, who was succeeded by Walter Allen Jenkins eight months later. Jenkins sent Khan abroad in 1954 for further studies in library science.
